SmoothOperator CRM for Asterisk(tm)

A PHP and AJAX based package for maintaining customer records and integrating with Asterisk

Also provides a module repository for easy installation of commercial integration points and software.

Note: This is under development and will be announced shortly

Description
This is a CRM with the ability to integrate with other packages via modules.

Installing modules is as simple as pointing and clicking.

This project is designed to provide a CRM for call centers which use Asterisk and is friendly to screen popping etc.

Modules we are creating XML stubs for are:

SmoothTorque
QueueMetrics
Flash Operator Panel 2
We will explain more as we get further into it
